properties.name: 3 Birds Restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Todd 18515 detroit ave lakewood ohio 441073birds offers guests a combination of exceptional food and professional attentive service in a relaxed atmosphere. Modern American food with imagination from pure ingredients true to their roots. Business casual dress is preferred. 30-50 per person, including some drinks. John Mariani | Nov 01 \'03 "At this ebullient American bistro, with its trussed ceiling, expansive brick walls, zinc bar and sleek industrial cast, it\'s almost impossible not to have a good time (especially if you can sit outside in good weather). Chef John Kolar doesn\'t fret about making culinary waves, instead focusing on flavorful dishes with a minimal number of ingredients: a goat cheese-filled beggar\'s purse with mixed greens and plum-wine sauce; a spicy Thai beef salad with mint, cilantro and Asian vinaigrette. Pan-roasted walleye pike is sidled with corn ravioli, carrot puree, and sorrel sauce, while juicy grilled tenderloin of beef is dashed with cabernet sauce and accompanied by seasonally good garlic-and-potato-stuffed profiterole. It would take more words than we have to explain the name (think Bob Marley), but the welcoming staff will fill you in."

properties.name: Clifton Diner
properties.description: Posted by Todd 44102 This Lakewood spot would be ideal for, say, a couple in which he craves traditional diner fare (cheeseburgers and fat, sourdough-breaded onion rings), while she wants something a bit more sophisticated (a yellowfin tuna steak club sandwich or tasty tossed salad). A small wine selection is available to complement your choices, and a tempting dessert display near the entrance makes guests remember to save room for an oversized slice of cake. During earlier hours, breakfast is big at the Diner. Local residents - as well as those who\'ve strayed from other suburbs -- line up for a crack at crispy bacon, French toast and stacks of pancakes.

properties.name: Crocker Park
properties.description: Posted by Todd 2050 CROCKER RD, WESTLAKE, OH 44145Once a prime farming settlement, Westlake is a thriving community, thanks to five decades of steady growth and development. Today, the city continues to attract upscale residents and homeowners as well as corporations with its mix of open space, beautiful homes, office buildings, industry, and community facilities. With the completion of Crocker Park, Westlake will be one of the most sought after business and residential destinations in Ohio.

properties.name: Edgewater State Park
properties.description: Posted by Todd  44102In the heart of one of Ohio\'s largest cities, Cleveland Lakefront State Park provides natural relief to the metropolitan skyline. Sand beaches, tree-lined picnic areas and panoramic views of the lake are found within the park along the Lake Erie shoreline.

properties.name: Hamilton's Martini Bar
properties.description: Posted by Todd 44114Sleek mahogany and chic martinis rule at this theater district saloon. The after-work, pre-theater crowd has flocked to this 12-table Playhouse Square hideaway since it opened in January 2004. Jockey for space at the mahogany bar while sipping a silky Coffee Lover\'s martini made with Stoli and Kahlua, or a take-no-prisoners Bombay Sapphire gin martini. Food is limited to complimentary hors d\'oeuvres (request the owner\'s recipe crab salad on Triscuits).

properties.name: Speed Trap
properties.description: Posted by ToddSpeed Limit = 35mph. Camera\'s on clifton Blvd between w.108 and w.110 are set to catch speeders AND those who run the w.110 Red Lights. These cameras will record your License plate and a ticket will be mailed to the registered vehicle address.

properties.name: Union Station Video Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Todd    2814 detroit ave cleveland ohio 44113Union Station Video Cafe (USVC) is a full service restaurant and video bar that offers food and bar service daily. Union Station offers a 15 minute lunch*, and FREE wireless internet. Come enjoy great food and fun with hit videos or play NTN Trivia games with your friends USVC offers three locations for you to enjoy the fun dining experience of Union Station Video Cafe; COLUMBUS, CLEVELAND, CINCINNATI
